message: Starting test suite creation. Reading real_mcp_server.py to understand core functions and their behaviors.

Analyzed 8 core utility functions (lines 47-1097). Identified test requirements: filesystem mocks for find_task_workspace/ensure_workspace, subprocess mocks for tmux functions, regex testing for resolve_workspace_variables. Creating tests/test_core_functions.py now.

Created tests/test_core_functions.py with 37 test functions covering 8 core utilities. Tests include success cases, edge cases (None, empty strings, special chars), error conditions, mocked filesystem/subprocess. Running pytest to verify all tests pass.

COMPLETED: tests/test_core_functions.py created with 39 comprehensive tests for 8 core utility functions. All tests pass (100% success rate). Tests cover: find_task_workspace (5 tests), get_workspace_base_from_task_workspace (4 tests), get_global_registry_path (3 tests), resolve_workspace_variables (9 tests), check_tmux_available (4 tests), check_tmux_session_exists (4 tests), ensure_global_registry (4 tests), ensure_workspace (3 tests), plus 3 edge case tests. Includes proper mocking of filesystem operations and subprocess calls. Fixed macOS symlink handling. Verified with pytest -v: 39 passed in 0.96s. Also created tests/__init__.py for module structure.
